name: Stotles
slogan: Our SaaS matches users with hyper-relevant business opportunities in the public sector
description:
Our mission is to unlock the potential of business and government working better, together.

At www.stotles.com, we're enabling businesses to win their fair share of public sector work by providing actionable transparency. We do this by using a ton of government data to identify business opportunities in the public sector, and match them with our users.

Backed by top European VCs and growing quickly, we're looking for ambitious and curious teammates to join us for the ride.

Check out about.stotles.com to learn about what it's like to be a part of Stotles

team.title: CPO
team.name: Carsten Schaltz
team.bioHtml:
BCG (Canada) --> Developer (London) --> Founder (London).

Value creation > Value capture

team.title: Technical Lead
team.name: Piotr Ćwieczkowski
team.bioHtml: A software engineer with 8 years of experience on varied projects, from developing a graphics driver to building full-stack applications in the finance industry

jobs.title: Software Engineer - Full-stack
jobs.description:
[See full posting here](https://www.notion.so/stotles/Software-Engineer-Full-stack-53be37dc5fc74f058dfabf1d77cc57ad)

We are looking for ambitious software engineers that are passionate about finding elegant solutions to complex problems.

As a small, cross-functional product team we aim for everyone to be able to work on all parts of the system. Each of us is eager to learn any technology and skill required to get the job done, and share their knowledge with the rest of the team.

With strong culture of ownership and responsibility we believe that our job is not done until *the* job is done. We take pride in delivering the highest quality, reliable product that delights our users.

As a software engineer at Stotles you will:
* Work closely with our CPO to shape the product design and implement our vision
* Take part in all aspects of product development; from early ideas, to releases, to monitoring it's performance in production
* Put on your "software architect" hat to design the architecture of the system together with the rest of the engineering team

As a small, cross-functional product team we aim for everyone to be able to work on all parts of the system. Each of us is eager to learn any technology and skill required to get the job done, and share their knowledge with the rest of the team.

With strong culture of ownership and responsibility we believe that our job is not done until the job is done. We take pride in delivering the highest quality, reliable product that delights our users.
